title: Association between growth differentiation factor-15 and adverse outcomes among patients with heart failure: A systematic literature review
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Ali Javaheri, Mualla Ozcan, Lauren Moubarak, Karen E. Smoyer, Michelle I. Rossulek, James H. Revkin, John D. Groarke, Lisa C. Tarasenko, Mikhail N. Kosiborod
